statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 2 \\ 6 \\ -6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -6 \\ -9 \\ -9 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
